title: Ep 40: Blair Eadie from Atlantic-Pacific on Her Best Fashion & Life Advice, Her Avril Lavigne Phase, and Why She Won’t Marie Kondo Her Closet
itunes:title: Ep 40: Blair Eadie from Atlantic-Pacific on Her Best Fashion & Life Advice, Her Avril Lavigne Phase, and Why She Won’t Marie Kondo Her Closet
description:
In this episode, we sat down with the fashionable, smart, and all-around wonderful Blair Eadie, the founder of Atlantic-Pacific! We ask her all your fashion and life questions, like why she started her blog, why she has chosen to keep it fashion-focused, her go to bargain finds, and the worst fad she participated in during high school (it includes an Avril Lavigne phase). Plus: the behind the scenes scoop on her clothing line and how wedding planning is going. We LOVE her and we know you will too! You can find her at @blaireadiebee and The-Atlantic-Pacific. 

Also in this episode, Becca is obsessed with her new jeans for tall ladies discovery, Grace is loving artist Melvin G., and Blair is obsessed with Local Electric jewelry!

Make sure you've read 99 Percent Mine by Sally Thorne, because next week we have Ashley Spivey from Spivey’s Book Club (and the Bachelor!) joining us for our February book club!  

Sponsor:

Dudley Stephens: Visit Dudley-Stephens.com and enter promo code BOP20 at checkout for 20% off your first purchase. Come twin with us!  

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
